path: /en/blog/2019-12-25-【セブ島】イギリス人バリスタのカフェ「-nanaymo」wifi有りでオシャレ！/

markdownRemark.html:
イギリス人バリスタのカフェ

コーヒー好きにはたまらない、本格カフェのご紹介です。

今回はイギリス人のバリスタ「クリス」がコーヒーを淹れてくれるカフェ「Nanaymo」です。

お店はグアダルーペの周辺にあります。地図は以下のリンクから確認してみてください。

NanaymoをGoogleMapでみる

お店の雰囲気

外観は、ココ入って大丈夫か？と心配になるような「家」感。

さすが英国紳士のカフェだけあって内装は無骨ながらもおしゃれです。

コーヒーを淹れてくれているのが、イギリスでバリスタをしていたクリス。

カフェのメニュー

カフェのメニューはこんな感じ。

本格的なのに、価格は据え置きのフィリピン価格です。

これは嬉しいですね。

こちらはカフェラテ。可愛いです。

コーヒーだけでなく、ティーのメニューもあります。

コーヒー苦手な方にも嬉しいですよね。

食事メニューもあります。パンやワッフルなど、軽食が中心です。

無料Wifiも使える

うれしい無料Wifiも使えます！

電源をとれるコンセントもあるので、勉強やお仕事も可能。

テーブルは本場イギリスのカフェのように少し低めですが、居心地の良い隠れ家的空間になっています。

まだあまり知られてないのかな？ 結構空いてて穴場です。

ぜひ行ってみてください。

frontmatter.title: 【セブ島】イギリス人バリスタのカフェ「 Nanaymo」Wifi有りでオシャレ！
frontmatter.description: セブ島にオープンした「Nanaymo」はイギリス人バリスタがコーヒーを淹れてくれるお洒落なカフェ。Wifiも使えてコーヒーの味も抜群。なにより隠れ家的な雰囲気が最高でした。
tags: セブおすすめスポット

messages.title: Guesthouse Storyshare Cebu - International stay for travelers
messages.description: Book Guesthouse Storyshare located in the heart of Cebu city in the Philippines. Every room is privete rooms yet reasonable in price.
messages.hero-subtitle02: in the heart of Cebu city
messages.about-text01: Spend time exactly how you want at the Guesthouse Storyshare Cebu, with relaxing shared lounge and your private room.
messages.about-text02: Even though this is a budget guesthouse, all the guest room have private shower and WC.
messages.about-text03: The guest house is located in central Cebu city so it's always convinient for every activity during your stay.
messages.apas-text01: Our guesthouse at Apas is a comfortable home in the center of a very bustling community. It is safe and cozy—a perfect place to relax while the neighborhood is teeming with life and activity.
messages.apas-text02: There’s a big living room where you can work on your laptop and connect to the strong WIFI connection or you can interact with other guests of different nationalities.
messages.apas-text03: If you prefer spending your time alone, there are also spaces around the premises.
messages.guadalupe-text01: Away from the busy streets of Cebu City, enjoy a calm and tranquil environment in the guesthouse. Our house has a big living room where you can relax and have a fun conversation with the other guests.
messages.guadalupe-text02: We often have Japanese guests, so if you are interested in Japanese culture, this place is for you.
messages.guadalupe-text03: You may also unwind and read books in the spacious living room or, enjoy connecting online with the strong WIFI connection and chat with your family and friends. You have access to all common areas.
messages.features01-desc: We have some moterbikes for rent. Enjoy the whole metro Cebu by bike.
messages.features02-desc: We provide local philippine food for lunch and dinner, which is just PHP100.
messages.features03-desc: Practice and learn foreign languages with native speakers from all over the world!
messages.features04-desc: We sometimes hold weekend tour. Enjoy the best activities in Cebu with us!
messages.features05-desc: In Guadalupe branch, all the guests speaks English so everyone can comunicate regardless of the nationality.
messages.features06-desc: We have guests from all over the world! Meet up new people and new cultures!
messages.rooms-apas-subtitle: Bustling city life, lively and vibrant atmosphere.
messages.rooms-apas-text01: Our guesthouse at Apas is a comfortable home in the center of a very bustling community. It is safe and cozy—a perfect place to relax while the neighborhood is teeming with life and activity.
messages.rooms-apas-text02: There are many kinds of local restaurants and cafes nearby, so you can always enjoy the tastes of the philippines.
messages.rooms-apas-text03: All rooms are single rooms and have their own bathrooms. There is a single bed, a desk and a chair for your convenience. There is also an air conditioner, a fan, and a wardrobe.
messages.rooms-apas-text04: Our guesthouse provides accommodation with a garden, private parking and a terrace, which enables you to relax even in the center of metro Cebu city.
messages.rooms-apas-text05: If you want to go the mall, Ayala Center Cebu is only 15 minutes away. If you do not have Philippine currency, there are a lot of money changers inside the mall. There are also many places to see nearby since the guesthouse is near to Cebu IT Park.
messages.rooms-apas-text06: IT Park is a business district that never sleeps and is filled with many restaurants and shops. If you want to enjoy a quiet and more laid-back environment, you can go for a walk inside Camp Lapu-Lapu and enjoy the scenery.
messages.expensive?: If the price on the booking site is more expencive,
messages.book-directly: Book directly and we apply the price above.
messages.rooms-guadalupe-text01: Away from the busy streets of Cebu City, enjoy a calm and tranquil environment in the guesthouse. Our house has a big living room where you can relax and have a fun conversation with the other guests.
messages.rooms-guadalupe-text02: You may also unwind and read books in the spacious living room or, enjoy connecting online with the strong WIFI connection and chat with your family and friends. You have access to all common areas.
messages.rooms-guadalupe-text03: There are some local restaurants nearby, not only that, a grate cafe with a varistor from UK is just next to our guesthouse.
messages.rooms-guadalupe-text04: The nearest Japanese or Korean or Local bars, cafés, and restaurants are only a few blocks away from the place. The nearest mall can be reached in less than 20 minutes.
messages.rooms-guadalupe-text05: All rooms are single rooms and have their own bathrooms. There is a single bed, a desk and a chair for your convenience. There is also an air conditioner, a fan, and a wardrobe.
messages.rooms-guadalupe-text06: Our guesthouse provides accommodation with a garden, private parking and a terrace, which enables you to relax even in the center of metro Cebu city.
messages.rooms-guadalupe-text07: There’s also a lot of transport vehicles you can ride on to-and-from the place. You can hail a taxi where the base rate is as low as 40PHP or ride a jeepney just for 8PHP.
messages.rooms-guadalupe-text08: Or if you want to do it the local way, you can back ride on a motorcycle called “habal-habal” for as low as 50PHP.
messages.wifi-desc: WiFi is available in public areas.
messages.laundry-desc: Laundry is available with Additional charge.
messages.parking-desc: Parking is available on site and costs PHP 20 per day.
messages.age-restriction-desc: There's no age requirement for guests.
messages.children-beds-desc01: Children of all ages are welcome.
messages.children-beds-desc02: But we don't have any baby-bed.
messages.cancellations-payment-desc: Prepayment policies vary according to apartment type. Please contact us for more info.
messages.contact-massage-placeholder: I want to book / Just checking the room avalability etc...
messages.contact-desc01: Feel free to contact us from the form above. Your questions will be answered by our Staff.
messages.contact-desc02: ※ We can send you a response within 24 hours if you send us a message during weekdays except during the Philippine public holidays and during the weekends.
messages.contact-desc03: ※ If there is no reply even after 24 hours, please check your spam folder.
messages.contact-desc04: ※ If there is no reply even after 24 hours, please check that the entered email address is correct.
messages.contact-desc05: ※ You can also send us a message to the Facebook page of Storyshare from the icon at the bottom of this page.
messages.contact-thanks-message01: Sometime we fail to recieve your message due to some Email setting errors.
messages.contact-thanks-message02: In case you don't get any reply in 48 hours, please try to contact us from our Facebook page. Thank you.
